metadata.description: 2036. Tokyo, ravished by the radioactive contamination caused by an accident at a nuclear power plant, is now in lock-down. "COPPELION", a special unit of the third division of Japan's Ground Self-Defense Forces made up of  three high school girls,  genetically engineered to be impervious to radioactivity, is sent in to Tokyo; "The City of Death".
metadata.name: COPPELION
